text: "Zooropa" is a 1993 song by Irish rock band U2. It is the title track and the opening track to their eighth studio album Zooropa. Promotional recordings of the song were released in both the United States and Mexico and the art cover features the European Union flag. ==Formats and track listings== ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Zooropa (song)
